sections.heading: and other instruments; where recorded
sections.text: Deeds and other instruments relating to or affecting the title of real estate in this state shall be recorded in the county in which such real estate, or any part thereof, is situated.SourceR.S.1866, c. 43, § 21, p. 284;R.S.1913, § 6215;C.S.1922, § 5614;C.S.1929

76-245.Deeds and other instruments; where recorded.

Deeds and other instruments relating to or affecting the title of real estate in this state shall be recorded in the county in which such real estate, or any part thereof, is situated.

SourceR.S.1866, c. 43, § 21, p. 284;R.S.1913, § 6215;C.S.1922, § 5614;C.S.1929, § 76-220;R.S.1943, § 76-245.

Cross ReferencesRecording fees, see section 33-109.
